original_title: The World in Question: The First World
overview: This program examines the legacy of Pythagoras and Plato and their impact on the modern world. Filmed across North America and Europe, the documentary is shot on location in the Greek home towns of these two great historical figures. Winner: Emily Award (Best of Festival), American Film and Video Festival. Silver Medal, Monte Carlo Festival. Blue Ribbon Award, American Film and Video Festival.
title: The World in Question: The First World
